tagline: r. kevin nelson is an engineer in california
body:
### About.
Hi.  I'm R. Kevin Nelson, a software developer, ideator, guitarist, and acroyogi living in San Francisco.  You can call me Kevin.

### rknLA? But you live in San Francisco...
I was born and raised in Los Angeles.  I even lived there for a while as an adult.

### Specialties
* Mobile experience
* Geolocation
* Digital Audio
* Ruby on Rails
* iOS
* System architecture and design

### Projects
* [Made in LA Soundmap](http://itunes.apple.com/us/app/made-in-la-soundmap/id525895329) - 2012   
Concept development, Software architecture, Code (iOS, Rails)
* [Safecast API](https://api.safecast.org/) - 2011 (ongoing)   
Code contribution, API design
* [Psychic City](http://vimeo.com/26903985) - 2011   
Maps, Geolocation, JavaScript


### Strengths
According to [Strengths Finder](http://strengths.gallup.com/110440/About-StrengthsFinder-2.aspx), my top 5 strengths are   

1. Ideation
2. Learner
3. Futuristic
4. Input
5. Positivity

I'm inclined to agree with them.

### Availability
I'm currently available for consulting opportunities, small-scale freelance coding work, beers, and acroyoga in the park.

Note to recruiters: I'm not interested in a full-time position at this time.

### Contact
I read kevin@rkn.la and I get beeped when you tweet at [@rknLA](http://twitter.com/rknLA)
name: rknLA
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
